description:
Freddy is a reporter from Raimon TV. He hosted and was in charge of the live broadcasts of matches for the Raimon Town Don Battles alongside Don George. He introduced the contestants as well as introduced the match lineups during the tournament. Like all sports reporters, he did a commentary during each match describing what was happening in the match and talked about the different strategies each contestant was using.
He was also the TV commentator and host for the Toaru Town Donamite Tournament. He once again gave his opinion and thoughts about the battles at the tournament along with Don George.
name: Takemitsu
